description:
Newbie whip slut Juliette learns about dignity and humility in labor on her first day of slave training. After her name is taken away, she is placed under sexual and physical duress till she reveals her character to us.
Training Name: whip slut
Strengths: considers herself adventurous, is generous with her energy, and has good endurance
Weaknesses: lack of composure, poor verbal skills, physically weak.
What are her fears and goals?
title: The Training of Juliette, Day One
